meanings.definition: Characterized by peculiar or unexpected traits.
meanings.sent1: The cat's quirkier behavior made it stand out from the rest of the pets.
meanings.sent2: She found the quirkier designs more appealing than the plain ones.
meanings.sent3: His quirkier sense of fashion always made his friends smile.
meanings.sent4: The quirkier details of the painting added depth to its meaning.
meanings.sent5: The quirkier characters in the story made it unforgettable.

meanings.definition: Showing a peculiar or eccentric behavior.
meanings.sent1: The quirkier students in the class always kept things interesting.
meanings.sent2: Her quirkier habits amused her friends.
meanings.sent3: The quirkier dance moves he showed off made everyone laugh.
meanings.sent4: The quirkier ideas she proposed sparked creativity in the group.
meanings.sent5: The quirkier actions of the main character added humor to the movie.

meanings.sent1: The quirkier house on the block was painted in bright colors.
meanings.sent2: The quirkier features of the car made it a popular choice.
meanings.sent3: His quirkier taste in music surprised his friends.
meanings.sent4: The quirkier patterns on the fabric caught her eye.
meanings.sent5: The quirkier ingredients in the dish gave it a unique flavor.
